attributes.action: Visa-free entry to the United Kingdom for all Ukrainians
attributes.additional_details: The Russian invasion of Ukraine on 24 February is the beginning of a major humanitarian crisis. The United Kingdom must play its part in combatting this crisis now before the crisis becomes even direr.
attributes.background: The Government must remove restrictions on Ukrainians entering the United Kingdom, offering visa-free entry in line with the policy of the European Union.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
